    1. fromBytes(byte[])

Interface PayloadDeserializer<T extends PacketPayload>

Type Parameters:
T - The payload type this deserializer produces
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface PayloadDeserializer<T extends PacketPayload>
Functional interface for deserializing packet payloads from bytes.

Implementations should handle malformed input gracefully by throwing IllegalArgumentException with a descriptive message.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    T
    fromBytes(byte[] bytes)
    Deserializes a payload from its byte representation.

  • Method Details

    • fromBytes

      T fromBytes(byte[] bytes)
      Deserializes a payload from its byte representation.
      Parameters:
      bytes - The serialized payload bytes
      Returns:
      The deserialized payload
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the bytes are malformed or invalid
